title: (x) Three's Company - similar to Twister {John Radio America (self)}
content:
Is there a font that is similar to the one used on the old sitcom "Three's Company"? Thanks in advance.   
   
 ![Three's Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230533im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48559.jpg)   
   
\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*   
   
Never mind. I found out that it is "Twister" of the Jukebox Type collection at Veer\</font\>\</font\>
author: jra
